speedy211:
Most likely it is. Cause this dumbass never ups his own shit.
if its using the susan* registration then its probably been reported so will not work and will cause the DJ to crash with an error 22

==================
Protection Error 16 - Fix
==================

Found this solution on net. Has worked for me so far. Try it if u wish.

Remove The registry entry--

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\VxD

-----------------------------

(((Complete Steps)))

Uninstall Virtual DJ

1- Delete C:/Program Files/VirtualDJ
2- Delete "C:/Documents and Settings/*Owner* /My Documents/VirtualDJ
-3 Delete all other VirtualDJ folders

- Delete these Registry Keys :
HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\VirtualDJ
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\VirtualDJ

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\VxD

If it works for you as well....spread the word. :-)


One more thing.
~ Before installation - disconnect.
~ After installation prevent VDJ from accessing the internet using firewall.

@zdude123

hey, i tried to experiment with this and worked for me. it over-rides my protection error. all I did was download a trial version of the most recent vdj. i replaced the "virtualdj_trial) with the included crack of this torrent and worked for me.

YES! THAT worked perfectly!, thank you! I had made the mistake of NOT catching the option to disable "autoupdate" and it went error 16 on me...but this crack works with the trial version...just copy and paste then delete the trial EXE from the folder..great work guys!
